pages.text: The [Shooting Star](book://resources/stargazing) you picked up left a fantastic shower of particles on their way to the ground. You created the Particle Spawner to replicate this spectacle - and lots of others - yourself.\\A chimney? Rocket launching particles? Atmospheric particle rain for your Pedestal? The Particle Spawner got you covered.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Use the GUI to configure the particles to your liking. Apply a [#](449900)redstone signal[#]() to start the fantastic display. You will unlock more particles as you progress.
